game.title: The Forgotten Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the temple.
game.description: The ancient artifact, a relic of the forgotten civilization, has been stolen. You have been hired to retrieve it from the abandoned temple in the jungle.

task.objective: Speak to Gilbert in the village.
task.description: Gain information about the temple and the artifact from him.

task.objective: Gather resources to craft a suitable boat for crossing the river.
task.description: Collect 10 logs, 5 hemp ropes and 3 precious gems from the jungle.

task.objective: Cross the river to reach the temple entrance.
task.description: Use the crafted boat to navigate the treacherous waters of the river.

task.objective: Solve the puzzles and overcome the guardians to reach the artifact.
task.description: Explore the temple chambers, defeat the guardians, and solve their riddles to gain access to the treasure chamber.
